contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox scientist |image = |birth_date = {{Birth-date|21 June 1876}} |birth_place = [[Texel]] |death_date = {{death-date|24 March 1956}} |death_place = [[Leiden]] |residence = |citizenship = |nationality = [[Netherlands|Dutch]] |ethnicity = |field = [[physics]] |work_institutions = |alma_mater = |doctoral_advisor = [[Johannes Diderik van der Waals]] |doctoral_students = |known_for = [[helium]] |author_abbrev_bot = |author_abbrev_zoo = |influences = |influenced = |prizes = |religion = |footnotes = |signature = }} '''Willem Hendrik Keesom''' (21 June 1876, [[Texel]] – 24 March 1956, [[Leiden]]) was a [[Netherlands|Dutch]] [[physicist]] who, in 1926, invented a method to freeze liquid [[helium]]. He also developed the first mathematical description of [[Intermolecular force#Dipole-dipole interactions|dipole-dipole interactions]] in 1921. Thus, dipole-dipole interactions are also known as [[Keesom force|Keesom interactions]]. He was previously a student of [[Heike Kamerlingh Onnes]], who had discovered [[superconductivity]] (a feat for which Kamerlingh Onnes received the 1913 [[Nobel Prize]] in Physics). He also discovered the lambda-point transition specific-heat maximum between Helium-I and Helium-2 in 1930 (Basic Superfluids p25/Tony Guenault). ==See also== *[[Timeline of low-temperature technology]] ==External links== * Albert van Helden, [http://www.historyofscience.nl/author.cfm?RecordId=260 ''Willem Hendrik Keesom 1876 – 1956''], In: K. van Berkel, A. van Helden and L. Palm ed., A History of Science in the Netherlands. Survey, Themes and Reference (Leiden: Brill, 1999) 498-500. * Scientists of the Dutch School: [http://www.knaw.nl/waals/keesom.html ''Willem Hendrik Keesom''] @ Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences. * P.H. van Laer, [http://www.inghist.nl/Onderzoek/Projecten/BWN/lemmata/bwn1/keesom ''Keesom, Wilhelmus Hendrikus (1876-1956)''], in Biografisch Woordenboek van Nederland. {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Keesom, Willem Hendrik | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Dutch physicist | DATE OF BIRTH =21 June 1876 | PLACE OF BIRTH =[[Texel]] | DATE OF DEATH =24 March 1956 | PLACE OF DEATH =[[Leiden]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Keesom, Willem Hendrik}} [[Category:1876 births]] [[Category:1956 deaths]] [[Category:People from Texel]] [[Category:Dutch physicists]] [[Category:University of Amsterdam alumni]] [[Category:Leiden University faculty]] {{physicist-stub}} {{netherlands-scientist-stub}}
